Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a string telephone device that shows two students communicating over a distance using sound.
The student can illustrate the string connecting the two cups to represent sound traveling between them.
The student can depict both students holding one cup each, showing how information is sent and received.
The student can label or illustrate how the device uses sound to solve the problem of communication.
The student can show or describe how such a device helps people communicate over a distance.
